long_description: The REI Alcove Windwalls are a 2-panel windbreak that attach to the Alcove shelter (sold separately) to offer wind and additional sun protection. Provides protection from any angle with a universal design that fits at any 1 of the 4 corners. 2 Windwalls can be combined to fully enclose the Alcove. Made from polyurethane-coated nylon taffeta.
short_description: The REI Alcove Windwalls are a 2-panel windbreak that attach to the Alcove shelter (sold separately) to offer wind and additional sun protection.
